Title: Automation engineer
Description:
Duties and Responsibilities:
" Design, develop, and maintain automated tests for backend, UI, and API components to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
" Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate automated testing into CI/CD pipelines and ensure timely delivery of high-quality software.
" Work closely with developers team members to identify test scenarios ,test manually and automate them effectively.
" Troubleshoot and debug automation code to ensure reliable test execution and accurate results.
" Continuously improve test coverage, execution efficiency, and reliability through optimization of automation frameworks and processes.
" Mentor team members on automation best practices and provide technical support as needed.
" Manage zero bug approach
Requirements:
" BSc in Computer sciences, Software engineering, or equivalent experience (IDF courses or equivalent bootcamp courses)
" 7+ years of automation testing
" Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
" Proven experience in automating tests for backend, UI, and API layers using programming languages such as Java/C#/Python, and frameworks such as Cucumber or other BDD framework.
" Familiarity with testing tools such as Selenium, Cypress, and Postman for backend, UI, and API testing.
" Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environments, preferably within a CI/CD pipeline.
" Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot issues in automated tests across different layers.
" Excellent communication skills with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
" Demonstrated ability to adapt to changing project requirements and technology stacks.
" Continuous improvement mindset with a proactive approach to enhancing automation frameworks and processes.
" Experience in mentoring team members and providing technical guidance on automation best practices is a plus.
Bonus Points
" Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker or Kubernetes.
" Experience with Linux

Description:
Experienced Test Automation Developer to a Software team.
to be a part of the multi-disciplinary team that develops and maintains challenging security solutions for the PC and Server markets.

- Experience in working with boards, chips and HW embedded systems - Advantage
- Knowledge in Security/Cryptography - Advantage
- Highly motivated team player with excellent oral and written communication skills
- Independent with ability to quickly learn new technologies and drive execution

Title: Automation Engineer
Description:
Our group's mission is to protect sensitive assets using an access control layer (authentication & authorization), cryptography, and secure communication while practicing the highest security standards. Our goal is to build and maintain a scalable, fault-tolerant, high-load, distributed system.

In this role you will be part of CyberArk’s core products transformation to the new generation software-as-a-service.

You will be designing and implementing test automation infrastructures in a multi-service complex environment.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related field/technology unit graduate with relevant experience.
At least 2-3 years experience in test automation OOP (Python / C#) and hands-on development in complex multi-platform and multi-component environments.
Good script skills (PowerShell, Groovy or Python)
Experience in Continuous Integration and Automation with Jenkins.
Familiarity with AWS cloud environment.
Strong ability to use new technologies and understand them in depth through rapid self-learning.
Excellent design and analytical skills.
Strong experience in QA methodologies.

Title: Performance SW Engineer
Description:
Join us at the forefront of innovative financial technology. Come work with us!
In this role, you will be involved in design reviews, drive architectural decisions and work closely with technical leaders.
You will participate in the whole life-cycle of features and releases, working closely with the R&D groups - from product requirements, through R&D and test automation development, you will own the performance aspects of the entire product and platform, making a huge impact on product scalability.
You are encouraged to be innovative, strive for excellence, and care about the small details.
" Design and build new performance automatic tests, including infrastructure development and improvement
" Drive performance automation across all engineering disciplines (BackEnd, Front End, Infrastructure) to the next level in terms of efficiency and stability
" Proactively monitor production environments availability, creating a holistic view of system health by collaborating with Ops and Engineering teams
" Define and implement performance benchmarks framework and tools
" Run external and internal API stress testing according to non-functional requirements
" Support production release cycle and customer-related performance related incidents
Our stack is:
" SaaS multi-tenant solution of microservices architecture managed over Kubernetes
" Multi-cloud-based solution
" Data pipelines technologies using various big data databases
" State-of-the-art CI/CD with cloud monitoring
Requirements:
" At least 5 years of experience in development/ Automation
" At least 1-3 years of experience in performance testing
" Experience with large-scale cloud production systems (AWS, Azure, GCP)
" Experience with high-level languages such as Java, Python, C++
" Experience with API stress testing and benchmarking
" Experience with monitoring and related technologies - Grafana, Prometheus, APM, DataDog, Linux
" Excellent analytical and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work successfully with engineers, product owners, and business stakeholders
" Process driver-have a proactive approach to spotting problems, areas for improvement, and performance bottlenecks
" Advantage - Knowledge of financial systems
" Advantage - Experience with Big Data / NoSQL databases performance
" Advantage - B.Sc in computer science or equivalent studies

Title: Software Engineer
Description: We’re looking for a challenge-seeking, code writing, innovative thinker that loves to explore and conquer new technologies. This is an exciting opportunity to join the experts and to learn from the best in the industry. As a Software Engineer, you will create and implement a variety of web products, accompanying the entire lifecycle, from idea to full-scale product. You will be working with the latest technologies, databases, and 3rd party APIs, including Facebook, Google, Amazon Web Services, and more. You will work with data structure algorithms such as machine learning, data mining, and optimizations, tackling industry challenges head-on. Working as part of a small elite team, you will directly impact the company’s success. You will utilize your solid foundation in computer science in order to consistently come up with new ideas to build products from scratch or to improve “ongoing” products. We’re looking for a self-starter, enthusiastic, optimistic, fast learner, good communicator, with a passion for coding.
Requirements:
Responsibilities
Build and enhance, web servers, websites and analytics tools - Full Stack
Integrate with 3rd party APIs including but not limited to Facebook, Google Ads, AWS and more.
Work mainly in Java and some with C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
Proactively identify opportunities for process improvement.
Work closely with product managers for product characterization and features definition.
Work closely with web designers.


Requirements
Computer Science Bachelor Degree.
Experience designing and programming distributed, large software systems using OOP (JAVA, C++, C# and other OOP languages).
A team player yet independent worker with good communication skills (written and oral).
Willing to work flexible hours as needed.


Advantages
Experience using modern web client-side tools, frameworks and methods (HTML5, JavaScript, GWT, Ember, Angular frameworks, Vue etc).
Database Expert.
At least 3 Years experience.

Description:
End-to-end development of software components/services (research, design, development, testing, rollout, monitoring)
Contribute to technological and architectural decisions
Mentor other engineers in the team (via code reviews, dedicated sessions, pair programming, etc.)

Fluent English (written & spoken)
A team player with strong communication skills and a can-do approach
Experience with TDD/BDD – advantage

Title: Full Stack Engineer
Description:
empowers the world's largest enterprises to secure their cyber-physical systems across industrial (OT), healthcare (IoMT), and enterprise (IoT) environments: the Extended Internet of Things (XIoT). The Platform integrates with customers' existing infrastructure to provide a full range of controls for visibility, risk and vulnerability management, threat detection, and secure remote access. Our platform is deployed by hundreds of organizations at thousands of sites across all seven continents.
Launched by the famed Team8 foundry in 2015, is headquartered in New York City, with employees across the Americas, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and Tel Aviv. Claroty has raised $635 million in funding from the world's largest investment firms and industrial automation vendors - including SoftBank, Bessemer Venture Partners, Rockwell Automation, Schneider Electric, and Siemens - making it the most well-funded industrial cybersecurity company.
At we are looking to hire individuals who embody our core values: People First, Customer Obsession, Strive for Excellence, and Integrity.
We always search for energetic people who will get excited about these values and make a difference.
Requirements:
Responsibilities
As a Full Stack Engineer at you will:
" Take full ownership over features, end to end, from design with product, architecture, and development to deployment at the customer.
" Design and solve complex computer network challenges in a creative and secure manner.
" Work and master a diversified technology environment - Angular, Python3, OS and network internals, critical mission architecture, and more
" Drive product and technical innovation as well as software development
" best practices.

:Requirements
" 5+ years of Knowledge and experience with Angular - Must
" 5+ years of experience developing server applications in Python\Javascript - Must

" Self-learner - Ability to take on new technologies, research and implement new solutions
" Adaptability, flexibility, positive energy, integrity, and ownership
" Experience with SQL databases - Advantage

is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment for all. We encourage applications from candidates of all diverse backgrounds.

Be part of analyzing, designing, and developing new features for the company's web interfaces and backend infrastructure of a fast-growing SaaS enterprise product. Take part in feature development from the requirement definition stage to final deliverable.

Computer Science degree or Elite alumni graduate or similar experience
5+ years of experience building highly-scalable, interactive backend applications using Java Spring or Spring Boot and interacting with web applications using Angular 2+
2+ years of experience with AWS/GCP/Azure
Proactive, highly motivated individual with a high work ethic and goal-oriented approach
Ability to lead complex technical challenges (high technical capabilities and independence, excellent design and analytical skills)
High ability to adopt new technologies and understand them in depth through rapid self-learning
Experience working on large & complex projects
Creative thinking & problem solving
Great interpersonal relations, team player

Title: Senior Fullstack Developer
Description:
So, tell me about you.?
Absolutely! Our company is a growing cyber security startup that makes Microsegmentation the easiest and most effective way to protect any organization from its next breach. By leveraging automation and self-service adaptive multi-factor authentication, we have brought to market a solution that provides autonomous, airtight network access security at scale.?
?
Okay but why your company??
Excellent question. The short answer is because we are the best at what we do.??
?
The company recently received Series A funding from a leading VC and has won multiple awards and mentions including Gartner Cool Vendor, being part of the Big50 Startup Report 2021, the 2021 Fortress Cyber Security Award, and for the second year in a row has received the 'Editor's Choice' award from InfoSec.?
?
Our R&D is based in Tel Aviv and we just established our North American HQ team.
It is a really exciting time to join the company's team!?
?
Sounds interesting. And the job itself?
As Frontend Engineer you will have the opportunity to work with exceptional talent and significantly impact the organization's growth while building one of the most innovative and promising new startups in network security.??
Requirements:
" Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
At least 5 years of experience as a Fullstack / Frontend Developer or similar role, showcasing a portfolio of frontend projects.
Hands-on experience in the following technology stack: Vue / React (Vue will be an advantage), d3, electron (advantage)
Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related frontend technologies.
Experience with frontend frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Vue.js) and proficiency in using associated tools.
Knowledge of responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
Understanding of version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.
Solid problem-solving skills and ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Detail-oriented mindset with a strong commitment to producing high-quality work.

Title: Fullstack Developer
Description:
ou will be part of a team, working on powerful energy management applications.
Addressing challenges all the way from local data acquisition to cloud driven operation.
We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated individual who can lead “end to end” features from requirement to release. The role will require a strong technical background for approaching challenges and crossing all product layers and technologies.

Title: Senior Full Stack Developer
Description:
Design, develop, and influence our flagship product.
Collaborate with front-end developers and other team members to design, implement, and provide a performant, scalable, reliable, and flexible solution.
Work with Product managers, Data analysts, and Data Scientists to design and improve our product.
Help us move from Groovy on Grails monolith to a microservices architecture on Java while using managed services in AWS and NoSQL technologies.
Review code, identify and troubleshoot problems while suggesting areas for improvement and optimization.
Build services from scratch, including k8s configurations using helm charts to make them scalable and deployable.
Actively collaborate with the team to design, develop, and implement new features and enhancements for our frontend SPA.
Division between back end and front end: 70% BE, 30% FE

At least 5 years of experience in Java backend development
·At least 2 years of front-end experience with frameworks like Angular or React/Redux lib
·Strong knowledge of relational databases (MySQL preferred)
Fluent in English
Experience with large-scale distributed systems
Experience with a microservices-based architecture – Must
Experience with Dockers and K8s – Must
Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure, preferably AWS – Must
Experience with writing Helm charts and Jenkins scripts - An advantage
Experience with technologies such as NoSQL, Queues, and Elastic – An advantage
Experience developing Groovy on Grails – A big advantage.

Title: QA Automation
Description:
We are looking for a strong, smart QA Automation Engineer to join our Development Team.

Job Responsibilities:

Conduct system-level and component-level tests. Strive to automate the process as much as possible by developing automation suites that provide high coverage, run fast and are easy to maintain
Work closely with product managers and developers to define test plans
Own End-to-End testing of complete modules of the product, covering all quality aspects
Work in an agile development process, utilizing Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment to reduce risks and solve bugs as early as possible
Build infrastructure for automation tests
Requirements:
2-3 years of hands-on experience in manual QA and development of QA automation – i.e. coding in a programming or scripting language, e.g. Java, Node.JS, etc.
Knowledge and experience in Test Automation Tools for different domains (e.g.: Selenium, Cucumber, Jemter, etc.)
Experience with Web-Applications testing.
Experience with API testing (e.g JMeter, postman etc.)
Fluent verbal and written English skills are required.

Experience in functional, UI, and data validation testing
Experience with Mobile-Applications testing
Experience with CI/CD flow & tools for supporting it ( i.e. Jenkins)
B.A./B.Sc. in Computer Science or similar field from a leading university or substantial experience from a technological unit

Title: Performance SW Engineer
Description:
Join us at the forefront of innovative financial technology. Come work with us!
In this role, you will be involved in design reviews, drive architectural decisions and work closely with technical leaders.
You will participate in the whole life-cycle of features and releases, working closely with the R&D groups - from product requirements, through R&D and test automation development, you will own the performance aspects of the entire product and platform, making a huge impact on product scalability.
You are encouraged to be innovative, strive for excellence, and care about the small details.
" Design and build new performance automatic tests, including infrastructure development and improvement
" Drive performance automation across all engineering disciplines (BackEnd, Front End, Infrastructure) to the next level in terms of efficiency and stability
" Proactively monitor production environments availability, creating a holistic view of system health by collaborating with Ops and Engineering teams
" Define and implement performance benchmarks framework and tools
" Run external and internal API stress testing according to non-functional requirements
" Support production release cycle and customer-related performance related incidents
Our stack is:
" SaaS multi-tenant solution of microservices architecture managed over Kubernetes
" Multi-cloud-based solution
" Data pipelines technologies using various big data databases
" State-of-the-art CI/CD with cloud monitoring
Requirements:
" At least 5 years of experience in development/ Automation
" At least 1-3 years of experience in performance testing
" Experience with large-scale cloud production systems (AWS, Azure, GCP)
" Experience with high-level languages such as Java, Python, C++
" Experience with API stress testing and benchmarking
" Experience with monitoring and related technologies - Grafana, Prometheus, APM, DataDog, Linux
" Excellent analytical and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work successfully with engineers, product owners, and business stakeholders
" Process driver-have a proactive approach to spotting problems, areas for improvement, and performance bottlenecks
" Advantage - Knowledge of financial systems
" Advantage - Experience with Big Data / NoSQL databases performance
" Advantage - B.Sc in computer science or equivalent studies

A hi-tech company developing products for network communications, with offices in the Shefela is looking for a Frontend SW Engineer to join our dynamic engineering team that designs and develops Voice.AI solutions.
The ideal candidate will join us for a long-term relationship and will help maintain existing products and infrastructure as well as designing and developing new projects.
We are looking for a professional who is passionate about investigating, learning, and implementing new technologies while going beyond the following job description to help where needed.
We prioritize for candidates who have relevant experience with best practice principles and own the maturity to be able to work independently, while being a team player who can follow directions from his/her supervisor.

Frontend SW Engineer and Bots developer to join our dynamic team at our HQ in Airport City, Lod, Israel.

Requirements

Title: Software Engineer
Description: We’re looking for a challenge-seeking, code writing, innovative thinker that loves to explore and conquer new technologies. This is an exciting opportunity to join the experts and to learn from the best in the industry. As a Software Engineer, you will create and implement a variety of web products, accompanying the entire lifecycle, from idea to full-scale product. You will be working with the latest technologies, databases, and 3rd party APIs, including Facebook, Google, Amazon Web Services, and more. You will work with data structure algorithms such as machine learning, data mining, and optimizations, tackling industry challenges head-on. Working as part of a small elite team, you will directly impact the company’s success. You will utilize your solid foundation in computer science in order to consistently come up with new ideas to build products from scratch or to improve “ongoing” products. We’re looking for a self-starter, enthusiastic, optimistic, fast learner, good communicator, with a passion for coding.
Requirements:
Responsibilities
Build and enhance, web servers, websites and analytics tools - Full Stack
Integrate with 3rd party APIs including but not limited to Facebook, Google Ads, AWS and more.
Work mainly in Java and some with C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
Proactively identify opportunities for process improvement.
Work closely with product managers for product characterization and features definition.
Work closely with web designers.


Requirements
Computer Science Bachelor Degree.
Experience designing and programming distributed, large software systems using OOP (JAVA, C++, C# and other OOP languages).
A team player yet independent worker with good communication skills (written and oral).
Willing to work flexible hours as needed.


Advantages
Experience using modern web client-side tools, frameworks and methods (HTML5, JavaScript, GWT, Ember, Angular frameworks, Vue etc).
Database Expert.
At least 3 Years experience.
